m_szDocTitle: Thermal-energy producing system and method - ETIAM OY
m_szDocSumamry: Thermal-energy producing system and method United States Patent Application 20150162104 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: System and method for producing thermal energy is based on a very large number of nanoscale particle accelerators in a volume accelerating electrons and hydrogen ions at very high local electric fields. Nanoscale particle accelerators comprise a dielectric material possessing electric polarizability and a metallic material capable of forming an interstitial and/or electrically conductive metal hydride and capable of enhancing the local electric field by the geometry a
